explanation: The stage direction describes Dassoucy pursuing Pierrotin, descending from the castle into the park, running, and being hindered by his lute which he holds in his left hand. This indicates movement and interaction with an object, which fits the 'movement' category (7) best.
stgdir: Dassoucy, poursuivant Pierrotin, descend du château dans le parc ; il court, embarrasse par son luth qu'il tient de la main gauche.
